title: Founders! Europe’s SpaceTech scene is hitting lightspeed — and here’s the inside scoop
content:
Are you a would-be founder looking for the right industry to build, grow, and scale? Are you an engineer looking for a new challenge? Do the words ‘earth observation’ and ‘geospatial data’ get you going? Then SpaceTech might be the next frontier for you. In the past, space was dominated by missions run by big space players, the US, Russia, and China. But the EU has set its sights to the skies, announcing a 20% increase in the European Space Agency’s budget at the end of 2021 — the largest the agency has seen in 25 years. Meanwhile, its upcoming…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: The EU's SpaceTech scene is on the rise. We spoke with five SpaceTech founders to find out the biggest opportunities and challenges.
